initializationAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/testformoney');
escapeAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Welcome to the Poké Mart! May I help you?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which balls would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: You'd like to purchase a Quick Ball for $1000 each?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run give @s cobblemon:quick_ball 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players remove @s Money 1000');
q.dialogue.set_page('buyend');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run give @s cobblemon:quick_ball 5');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players remove @s Money 5000');
q.dialogue.set_page('buyend');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run give @s cobblemon:quick_ball 10');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run give @s cobblemon:premier_ball 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players remove @s Money 10000');
q.dialogue.set_page('buyend');
